sentences.sContent: Do you lose your balance because of dizziness or do you ever lose consciousness?
sentences.sContent_eng: Do you lose your balance because of dizziness or do you ever lose consciousness?
sentences.sCn: 你曾否因为头昏眼花而失却平衡或你曾否失去知觉？

words.tran: 晕眩的；使人头晕的；昏乱的；心不在焉的；愚蠢的
使人眼花地；头昏眼花地
使头晕眼花；使混乱；使茫然
